roleset.name: cause to be very wide, causing to widen (legitimate alternate sp. of 'dilation'), (cause to) widen
roleset.note: DILATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dilate' based on sentences in brown. (from dilate.01-v predicate notes)
DILATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with dilate.01. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from dilation.01-n)
DILATED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to dilate.01. No Vn class. Framed by Katie. (from dilated.01-j)

example.name: not eyes, this time
example.text: If he foresaw any problem because of the quality of the hymen, it was recommended that [simple procedures]-2 be undertaken [*-2]at once [0] [*T*-3] to incise the hymen or, preferably, to dilate it.

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Under the excitement of caresses and sexual stimulation the vagina relaxes and dilates and the local moisture greatly increases, providing an excellent lubricant to help achieve an easier penetration.

example.name: Arg1
example.text: What's new in dilatation of the ascending aorta?
Dr. Spectacles dilation of Sanjay's eyes allowed herto test for opthalmological abnormalities.

example.name: Both args
example.text: Some of the benign ducts are cyctically - dilated.
